text: (Umwamikazi) yarabwiwe ati “Injira mu ngoro!” Nuko ayibonye akeka ko ari amazi menshi (azamura imyambaro) agaragaza imirundi ye. (Sulayimani) aravuga ati “Mu by’ukuri (ibi ubona) ni ingoro ishashemo ibirahuri (bishashe hejuru y’amazi)!” (Umwamikazi) aravuga ati “Nyagasani wanjye! Mu by’ukuri narihemukiye none nifatanyije na Sulayimani kwicisha bugufi kuri Allah, Nyagasani w’ibiremwa byose.”
